db.name: Anh Lan Nguyen
db.address: 87/142 Đinh Tiên Hoàng, phường 3, Bình Thạnh

db.title: Kế toán, Phục vụ, Thực tập
db.about: My name is Nguyen Lan Anh and I come from Hochiminh University of Economics – International School of Business (UEH – ISB). The nature of my degree and university environment has prepared me for any chance coming up. It involves an English program for my whole four years of acquiring knowledge, a great deal of presentations and reports requiring teamwork and collaboration, communication and time-management, leadership and self-motivation. I have the enthusiasm and determination to contribute to the organization as well as the community.
db.skill: Time management; Self-motivation; Leadership; Communication skills
